```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
# :::::: SOME GLOBAL DEFINITIONS ::::::::

# packages to load
library(Hmisc)
library(stargazer)
library(stats)
library(car)
library(lmtest)

# objects to use in the project
setwd("~/Desktop/Columbia/GR5015/independent_project")
d = read.csv("nba.csv")

#summary <- summary(d)
# visualize the results
stargazer(d, type = "text")
```


```{r normality test}
# conduct the test of normality
shapiro.test(d$Salary)
```

```{r new nor test}
# conduct the test of normality
d$ln.Salary = log(d$Salary)
shapiro.test(d$ln.Salary)
```





```{r initial model}
# visualize model1 result
d$ln.Salary = log(d$Salary)
lm1 <- lm(ln.Salary ~ Age + G + GS +MP+FG+FGpct+threeP+threePpct+twoP+twoPpct+eFGpct+FT +FTpct+ORB+DRB+AST+STL+BLK+TOV+Pfoul+PTSperG+PG+PF+SG+SF+Exp, data=d)
summary(lm1)
```

```{r collinearity}
# check collinearity
vif(lm1)
```

```{r model 2}
# visualize model2 result
lm2 <- lm(ln.Salary ~ Age + G + GS+threePpct+twoPpct+eFGpct +FTpct+ORB+DRB+AST+STL+BLK+TOV+Pfoul+PG+PF+SG+SF+Exp, data=d)
summary(lm2)
```


```{r VIF 2}
# check collinearity
vif(lm2)
```


```{r bp}
# check heteroscedasticity
bptest(lm2)
```

```{r plot}
# visualize model2
plot(lm2)
```

```{r try}
salarybc <-BoxCoxTrans(d$ln.Salary)
print(salarybc)
```

```{r try 1}
d <- cbind(d, salary_new=predict(salarybc, d$ln.Salary))
lm3 <-lm(salary_new ~ Age + G + GS+threePpct+twoPpct+eFGpct +FTpct+ORB+DRB+AST+STL+BLK+TOV+Pfoul+PG+PF+SG+SF+Exp, data=d)
summary(lm3)
```

```{r 434}
bptest(lm3)
```

```{r 23}
plot(lm3)
```

```{r 234}
vif(lm3)
```

```{r 235}
lm4 <-lm(salary_new ~ Age + G+GS+threePpct:eFGpct:twoPpct+FTpct+ORB+DRB+AST+STL+BLK+TOV+Pfoul+PG+PF+SG+SF+Exp, data=d)
summary(lm4)
```
